filters

Interface FilterInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShuffleFilter, SubsampleFilter, TFIDF

    public interface FilterInterface
    This interface declares basic filtering operations on the data. It either performs the filtering by modifying the existing dataset or by making a new copy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filter(DataSet dset)
      Performs filtering on the data.
      DataSet filterAndCopy(DataSet dset)
      Filter the data and make a new copy.

    • Method Detail

      • filterAndCopy

        DataSet filterAndCopy(DataSet dset)
        Filter the data and make a new copy.
        Parameters:
        dset - DataSet to filter.
        Returns:
        Filtered dataset.

      • filter

        void filter(DataSet dset)
        Performs filtering on the data.
        Parameters:
        dset - Filtered dataset.
